name: Extended Membership Directory for Paid Memberships Pro
author: eighty20results

sections.description:
Exending the Paid Memberships Pro - Member Directory and Profile pages plugin to support filtered custom search fields for user meta data separate billing and shipping sections on the .

.
sections.changelog:
2.2

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add pmproemd_add_extra_directory_output action hook in directory template (Include stuff at bottom of directory entry for user/entity)
  2. BUG FIX: Didn't include extra search input fields/selections is search portion of profile page

2.0.2

  1. BUG FIX: Didn't remove slashes from escaped characters when displaying the field contents from Register Helper

2.0.1

  1. BUG FIX: Not enough space around the Billing/Shipping Info section

2.0

  1. BUG FIX: Didn't handle zip codes in billing/shipping info
  2. BUG FIX: Don't embed a website if there's a parameter containing the 'url' string in the fields attribute
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add pmporemd_true_false() function to check input values & return true if they're true, false if false.
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Set default shortcode attributes
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Use pmproemd_true_false for shortcode attributes
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Add 'detailed profile page' link optionally activated for current and logged in members only (members_only_link='true', false by default)
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Have a `pmpro_member_directory_extra_search_output` action in addition to the filter
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Grant a logged in user access to their own (editable) profile and a link to look at the read-only (editable_profile='true', false by default)
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Type check the show attributes
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Let the current user either view or edit their profile
  11. ENHANCEMENT: Support for separate billing and shipping address section. The PMPro Billing & Shipping information metadata fields must be included defined in the 'fields' attribute of the shortcode, and the 'billing_address' and/or the 'shipping_address' attributes have to be set to 'true' ('false' by default. Valid 'true' values are '1', 'true', 'yes'. Valid 'false' values are '0', 'no', 'false' )
  12. ENHANCEMENT: Simplified the header filter names (more descriptive) for the Billing & Shipping info sections
  13. ENHANCEMENT: Removed debug output
  14. ENHANCEMENT: Add basic alignment styles for the shipping/billing sections

1.6

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add check for the other (standard) Member Directory add-on presence
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Added partial French translation
  3. BUG FIX: Avoid namespace collisions with standard directory

1.5.1

  1. BUG FIX: Only attempt to load extra search fields if they've been defined
  2. BUG FIX: Typo in $orderby variable (should be $order_by)
  3. BUG FIX: Sanitize search info when looking at it
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Add reset link for search form (only if search is active)
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Remove debug info

1.5

  1. BUG FIX: Make sure Search button doesn't overlay the Search field
  2. BUG FIX: Search gets clobbered by header
  3. BUG FIX: Escape URLs when printing to front end
  4. BUG FIX: Better escaping of data on front-end pages
  5. BUG FIX: Sanitize values better when printing
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Initialize variables before use
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Remove extra whitespace
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Add localization
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Force search to use precise values in query
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Allow user to specify WordPress Role(s) to use as filter for directory
  11. ENHANCEMENT: Added documentation for extra filters (pmpromd_extra_search_filters, pmpromd_exact_search_values)
  12. ENHANCEMENT: Load localization function(s)
  13. ENHANCEMENT: Use plugin slug (for standard version) in localization
  14. ENHANCEMENT: Fixed code style
  15. ENHANCEMENT: Explicit priority for all action hooks
  16. ENHANCEMENT: Added locatlization loader to build script

1.4

  1. ENH: Add wrapper around Search form components for more direct placement control

1.3.1

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Make sure search area is big enough.

1.3

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add support for one-click plugin upgrade
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Add build infrastructure
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add plugin specific constant
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Clean up the SQL statement (escape variables)
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Refactor CSS
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Fix placement of Search button
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Fix layout of Search button
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Fix placeholder text width for Select2 inputs
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Add versioned CSS file support
